traits.name: Improved Critical
traits.desc: Longsword and spear attacks score a critical hit on a roll of 19 or 20.

traits.name: Two-Weapon Master
traits.desc: When attacking with two weapons, a biclops may reroll any 1 on a damage dice, keeping the second result.

traits.name: Two Heads
traits.desc: The biclops has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks and on saving throws against being blinded, charmed, deafened, frightened, stunned, and knocked unconscious.

traits.name: Wakeful
traits.desc: When one head of the biclops is asleep, the other head is awake.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The biclops makes three attacks with its two longswords. It can choose to hurl two spears or throw two rocks instead.

actions.name: Longsword
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +13 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. Hit: 26 (4d8 + 8) slashing damage.

actions.name: Spear
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +13 to hit, reach 15 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 22 (4d6 + 8) piercing damage.

actions.name: Rock
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack: +13 to hit, range 30/120 ft., one target. Hit: 30 (4d10 + 8) bludgeoning damage.
